thread.section_title: Safegenericpharmacy Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Safegenericpharmacy | safegenericpharmacy.com
thread.title: lori kissinger

author: lori kissinger
title: lori kissinger
text: I am so pleased with everything. The product was exactly what I ordered and arrived within a couple weeks from ordering. Safegenericpharmacy kept me informed of the status of my parcel from the beginning all the way to delivery. They provided me with a traceable number so I could feel secure knowing that my package was on it's way. I'm very happy and would definitely use safegenericpharmacy again.
